loginDescription: Sign in to access your account
name: Name
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
passwordNotStrong: Password must contain uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
signupDescription: Create an account to get started
resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email address to reset your password
resetPasswordEmailSent: We've sent you an email. Please check your inbox.
checkEmailForReset: Check your email for a link to reset your password. If you don't see the email, check your spam folder.
updatePasswordDescription: Create a new secure password for your account
passwordUpdatedSuccess: Your password has been successfully updated.
redirectingToDashboard: Your password has been updated. You will be redirected to the dashboard...
